title: Bloomberg Markets: Kent Discusses Legacy of Roger Federer
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kent Discusses Legacy of Roger Federer
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Richard Kent\u0010Author/Attorney\u0010Discussing his books "Federer-Nadal" and "Inside The U.S. Open" and his thoughts on this year's U.S. Open.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
